document.masterDocTitle: Notes on the tribe Petrognathini Blanchard, 1845 from China, with description of a new species from Yunnan (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lamiinae)

Monochamus ruber
Hope, 1839: 43
;
Hope, 1840: 441
, pl. 30, fig. 5.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material examined.
Syntypes of
Monochamus ruber
, 2 males , India , Assam , leg. William Griffith (in OUMNH ). Examined by photographs taken by James Hogan
.

Distribution. China : Yunnan , Xizang (new province record); India : Assam (Mukhopadhyay & Halder 2003), Meghalaya , Sikkim and West Bengal ; Bangladesh (Silhet = Sylhet ); Myanmar ( Kachin , Mandaley), Nepal .
